title: ↪ 📱 Furnished Direct Ocean View, Large 2 Dont Wait Any Longer  SUNNY ISLES:
posting_body: ['REF# 11R114', '$6800 · 1602 Sqft · 2/2.5 · Furnished · La Perla Condo ·', 'Sunny Isles', 'Call ➟ Text ➟ WhatsApp', "📲 786'*'5O5'*'4314", 'Carlos Manchego', 'Goldstein Realty', 'show contact info', 'Direct ocean view, large 2 bedrooms/ 2.5 bath.', 'Fully furnished & equipped, tastefully decorated, upgraded kitchen, fresh painted, huge rap-around terrace from 32nd floor!', 'with always preferable east view (ocean, city, intracoastal).', 'Luxury amenities, including pool, gym, jacuzzi, beach service and valet parking.', '24 h concierge.', 'Convenient location close to shopping entertainment and public transportation.', 'Priced for 6 or more months rent.', 'Available for long term only.', 'Priced for one year lease.', 'Price for 6 months will be discussed.', 'Read Less', 'REF# 11R114', 'tags:', "brickells flagler homes, venetia condo, icon bay miami, icon bay miami, brickell key, epic, the palace, 1800 biscayne plaza, millecento, mybrickell, grovenor house, resorts world miami, quantum on the bay, cassa brickell, the grand condo, l'hermitage, quantum on the bay, the mutiny, bay point homes, havana lofts condo, marina blue, paramount miami worldcenter, imperial at brickell, brickell city centre - reach, vizcayne south, 500 brickell, belmar homes, the wind condo, vizcayne, hyde midtown, pet-friendly rentals, brickell,, met 3, brickell harbour", '_mr11']
